مشتری کے ہمارے نظام شمسی میں سب سے زیادہ: Which planet has the most moons in our solar system? Jupiter moons count

Moons across the Solar System Jupiter boasts 95 moons but Saturn has more moons than Jupiter, with a staggering 274 moons confirmed so far. 128 of Saturn's moons were only recently discovered, by an international team of astronomers in March 2025. So which planet has the most moons? The answer is Saturn.
Which planet has the most moons in our solar system? Jupiter moons count

Moons of Jupiter Jupiter has 95 moons that have been officially recognized by the International Astronomical Union. But the number doesn't capture the complexity of the Jovian system of moons, rings and asteroids. The giant planet has thousands of small objects in its orbit.
